title: How to Make a Barbados Breeze Drink

steps.headline: Pour the rum into a two cup measuring cup.
Pour the orange curacao into the measuring cup.
Pour the lime juice into the measuring cup.
Dump the sugar into the measuring cup.
steps.description: Stir the sugar well to dissolve into the mix.

steps.headline: Pour in the club soda while mixing.
Pour mixture into the two glasses.
Garnish with the orange slices and cherries.

text: Pour the rum into a two cup measuring cup.  Pour the orange curacao into the measuring cup.  Pour the lime juice into the measuring cup.  Dump the sugar into the measuring cup. Stir the sugar well to dissolve into the mix. Pour in the club soda while mixing.  Fill two glasses with ice.  Pour mixture into the two glasses.  Garnish with the orange slices and cherries.
